subdisciplines.name: Neuroanatomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure and organization of the nervous system.

subdisciplines.name: Neurochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical processes that occur in the nervous system.

subdisciplines.name: Neuroendocrinology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interactions between the nervous and endocrine systems and the regulation of physiological processes.

subdisciplines.name: Neuroethology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the natural behavior of animals and the neural basis for that behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Neuropharmacology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how drugs affect the nervous system and behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Neurophysiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the function of the nervous system, particularly the activity of neurons.
